rmangal 0.6.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Vignette Title

Retrieve mangal networks collection

Source: R/get_collection.R
get_collection.Rd

Retrieve mangal networks collection

get_collection(ids, ...)

Arguments

ids

numeric vector of mangal network IDs or object mangalSearch returned by functions search_*
...

arguments from rmangal::get_network_by_id()

Value

  • networks: list of object mgNetwork (see rmangal::get_network_by_id())

Examples

get_collection(ids = c(1035:1037))
#> $networks
#> $networks[[1]]
#> $network
#> $network$id
#> [1] 1035
#> 
#> $network$name
#> [1] "hadfield_2014_20140201_1035"
#> 
#> $network$date
#> [1] "2014-02-01T05:00:00.000Z"
#> 
#> $network$geom
#> $network$geom$type
#> [1] "Point"
#> 
#> $network$geom$coordinates
#> $network$geom$coordinates[[1]]
#> [1] 45.41222
#> 
#> $network$geom$coordinates[[2]]
#> [1] 39.20889
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> $network$description
#> [1] "Flea distribution and abundance on small mammals (Soricomorpha and Rodentia) at Nakhichevan"
#> 
#> $network$public
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> $network$all_interactions
#> [1] FALSE
#> 
#> $network$created_at
#> [1] "2019-02-26T19:28:02.957Z"
#> 
#> $network$updated_at
#> [1] "2019-02-26T21:02:24.670Z"
#> 
#> $network$dataset_id
#> [1] 72
#> 
#> $network$user_id
#> [1] 2
#>
